headline: Virus Fuels Anti-Chinese Sentiment Overseas
abstract: Fears of the outbreak have fueled xenophobia as a wave of panic spreads, sometimes outstripping practical concerns.
lead_paragraph: In Japan, the hashtag #ChineseDonâ€™tComeToJapan has been trending on Twitter. In Singapore, tens of thousands of residents have signed a petition calling for the government to ban Chinese nationals from entering the country.
